source_text: Ore Reserves have been calculated using metal prices of A$3,313.91/t Pb and A$37.89/oz Ag and royalties of 4.3% of gross revenue including allowable deductions.
additional_details: This royalty is stated as a percentage of gross revenue and is used in the calculation of Ore Reserves. While not explicitly termed "NSR", a royalty based on "gross revenue" is very similar in nature to a Net Smelter Return royalty.
